description: This course will focus on birth, aging, as well as selected chronic and infectious diseases in South Asia. For each health condition/lifestyle a framework of anysis awill develop incorporating the complex set of factors thatcome into play. Sociocultural beliefs; status markers--gender, class, caste,occupation;availability and accessibility of publicand private health services;state, national, and international plans and policies will be consideredd. An overview of South Asian demography, health problems and services will introduce the course.
name: CTMP ISSUES IN S.A. HLTH
